thread.title: Keith

author: Keith
title: Keith
text: This is the way to do it! Decided late Sunday evening I needed new tyres. Went on to the Tyres On The Drive site, entered Reg No, picked my tyres and they were expertly fitted the next day, Monday. On my drive! Great prices too as well as an amazingly convenient way to get new tyres fitted. The fitter, Steve, arrived on time (in fact earlier than scheduled following a call to my mobile to check this was OK). Nice guy, knows what he's doing and in about an hour I had 4 new tyres and fully balanced wheels. Highly recommended!
